mapper.select: SELECT ett.id, et.id as emergencyTeamId, et.emergency_teamname as emergencyTeamName FROM emergency_training_team ett LEFT JOIN emergency_team et ON ett.emergency_team_id = et.id WHERE ett.emergency_training_program_id = #{id} and ett.del_flag = 0

select GROUP_CONCAT(su.realname) from emergency_training_team ett left join emergency_team et on et.id = ett.emergency_team_id left join sys_user su on su.id = et.manager_id WHERE ett.emergency_training_program_id = #{id} and ett.del_flag = 0 group by ett.emergency_training_program_id
